imdb.title: Ragnarok: The Animation
imdb.plot: A death-obsessed scientist tempts a goddess on the last day of the world.

episodes.title: Sono ken wa nan no tame ni aru no desu
episodes.plot: Roan and Yuufa enter Rune-Midgaard's capital on the beginning of their adventures. After doing a bit of shopping, they wonder around the city and get lost. In a back alley they stumble across three ruffians accosting a lady mage. They help the mage and scare the ruffians away. The mage, Takius by name, sits down to eat with Roan and Yuufa and while there, they discuss the growing evil in the land. The three ruffians summon a powerful monster, called The Clocktower Manager, to get revenge for their defeat earlier.

episodes.title: Yoroshiku ne, Oniichan
episodes.plot: Upon discovering that the water is his room doesn't seem to be working, Roan decides to go out and buy breakfast. While on his way back to the inn where they are staying, he over hears some men talking about a Golden Thief Bug in the sewers, which must explain why his water isn't working. Roan heads back to the inn and convinces Yuufa that they are ready to head into the sewers to confront and kill this Golden Theif Bug. After encountering and defeating some minor monsters, they see a small pink poring, which they follow and discover a girl in danger. They rescue her ...

episodes.title: Watashi wa shinjitemasu
episodes.plot: The group reached Geffern to hear news that ghost wanders inside Geffern Tower and so far no one has ever come out uninjured. Thanks to Maya's words, they decides to enter Geffern Tower with the help of Takius. But Takius doesn't seems to trust Maya at all.

episodes.title: Sore wa omae na no ka
episodes.plot: The group decides to head back inside the tower where suddenly, Roan and the girls were separated and get attacked by a strong monster each. Luckily, Iruga and Judia saves them and joins their party.

episodes.title: Ima, nante itta no?
episodes.plot: The group intends to head back towards Prontera until they've faced a gigantic monster named Bahopment. Meanwhile Yuufa was shocked to hear about Keough from Judia.

episodes.title: Dare ni watashi no jama wa sasenain dakara
episodes.plot: Yuufa was getting suspicious of Keough alive so she decides to heard to the forest in search for his brother.

episodes.title: Nagusamete kureru no!?
episodes.plot: The group heads to Alberta to fight with the monsters inside but it turns out to be a false alarm since the monsters are 'pet monsters'. Meanwhile, Maya befriends a human monster named Alice after saving her from Anasan and her two minions. But Takius sees it and hurt her feelings and make her go to Alice in tears. The next day, Ansan wants revenge and intend to kill Alice.

episodes.title: Inochi no tôtôsa wo shiranu mono wa fukô da
episodes.plot: The group were supposed to head towards Morroc Desert but gets lost in Payon Forest thanks to Judia's overconfidence. She later tells how she first met Iruga.

episodes.title: Subete wa mari no tame ni
episodes.plot: The group heads towards Morroc when they stumble upon Ant Hell. They enter and see lots of ants and they were even happy to see the Queen. At night, Takius makes a horrible mistake by killing the Queen's eggs and that makes the monsters in Ant Hell go on a rampage.

episodes.title: Oniisan nan desho!
episodes.plot: At Morroc, Maya suggest kicking Takius out of the group for her actions in Ant Hell but they still need her. They want her help to enter the pyramids and defeat the monsters inside. They were more intrigued when they heard Keough was involved too.

episodes.title: Kono yo ni aru no wa shitsubô dake da
episodes.plot: Now monsters and the undead appear in Morroc and it's up to them to stop the source of the problem, Anubis, for creating chaos.

episodes.title: Boku ja dame nan da...
episodes.plot: The gang have a rest in Morroc while Roan keeps practices by killing some monster in the desert. But after seeing Yufa hugs Iruga , this makes some misunderstanding and leaves the group. Meanwhile, Maya and Judia have some plans for Iruga during the party at night. But soon, the leader heard new of Al De Baran Clock Tower was infested by monsters.

episodes.title: Mamoru mono...
episodes.plot: Roan is in Izulde trying to power up his sword when he met and team up with Anasan and her minions. They head to the island and gets items but Roan's madness scares them and nearly gets him killed. Luckily, a female Crusader saves Roan from a powerful monster and Roan begs her to teach him to become a Crusader like her.

episodes.title: Dôshite kotaete kudasasranai no desu
episodes.plot: In Al De Baran, the gang were inside the tower and gets themselves separated. Yufa met his brother in his normal attitude but wasn't enough to fool Iruga. He later tells in his evil state how he becomes evil and tries to kill them. Iruga was badly injured and intends to finish him off but a familiar face saves them.

episodes.title: Daijôbu, ore ga iru
episodes.plot: Yufa was surprised to see Roan who is now a Crusader. He managed to defeat Keough but he fled. The group managed to stop the tower but Iruga decided to stay in Al De Baran (as he's injured) while Judia stays with him.

episodes.title: Nani mo sukuenai...
episodes.plot: The group heads to Payon and notices Roan's behavior has changed. Yufa is getting worried about it and later decides to leave the party for awhile to become a priest. Meanwhile, lots of undead appear in Payon and keep coming.

episodes.title: Sude ni omae no yogoreteiru
episodes.plot: The situation turns worse as more undead appear and they have to flee. Worse that all the archers ran out of arrows. Roan couldn't fight all of them but is saved by a red-haired archer and teaches him the right path-that power isn't everything-before he returns back to the party.

episodes.title: Minna wakattetanya
episodes.plot: Yufa came back as a Priest and tries to save them once they've finished the job but soon they find the source of the undead appearing, Moonlight Cat. She intends to kill them but Yufa and the rest of the group even Roan manages to comfort her. But Zephil, Takius Master burns the monster to death and now plotting to kill them. Luckily Iruga and Judia appears in time to save them. In the end, everyone in the group pray the Moonlight Cat's graveyard while Takius leaves the party.

episodes.title: Zutto issho da yo
episodes.plot: The group heads back to Alberta where they were greeted by an unfriendly monsters while Maya sees a monster-type Alice where she has to decide whether to kill it or spare it.

episodes.title: Mô, iiya...
episodes.plot: After reaching to another port, the group intends to head towards Comodo but unfortunately Maya is still in shocked and walks to another area. She then realize that Alice will be always with her. Meanwhile, Roan met Keough but more stronger but just before Roan manage to defeat him, Yufa came and shield him, making an escape for him.

episodes.title: Omae ga hitsuyô nan da
episodes.plot: On their way, the group has to go inside a cave to reach Comodo. But Roan gets split up with the group while the rest have to fight with Keough and his monsters. Roan then was taught and lead by a female Monk and shows him back to the group. In the end, Yufa ask him a question "What's their relationship?". Roan answer "We're childhood friends!"

episodes.title: Sabishii no wa docchi!
episodes.plot: The group reached Comodo where they found Anasan and her minions were seduced by Dancers and Bards because they claim themselves to be the one whose gets their credit. Suddenly, as they were enjoying, they were attacked by monsters while Yufa gets split up only to find Keough.

episodes.title: Sayonara...
episodes.plot: Roan manages to save the dancers and thanks them for showing the pattern. Just then, the same female Moke appears. She later changes into a Archer from Payon and then a Crusader in Izulde and finally her true self as the Legendary Witch. She tests Roan with her sword and Roan passes She later gives him the sword and asks him to remember what he has learned. After she teleports to another area, it turns out that Bahopment has an alliance with her. Roan learns his lesson but was too late as Yufa leaves the party with Keough.

episodes.title: Subete no kecchaku wo tsukeru basho
episodes.plot: Takius joins back the group as a Sage and later the group heads to Glass Helm. But after saving Anasan's gang from the monsters, 'Yufa' teleports them to Glass Helm where Takius fights with her master while Iruga deals with Keough.

episodes.title: Ayamachi ni kizukishi mono
episodes.plot: As Roan , Maya and Judia rushed in different directions, Takius's master dies and dies with her student after regretting of his bad deeds. Meanwhile, Maya found the seven crystals while Judia found a new weapon. Roan found Yufa and gets a kiss but she kills him as she turns evil by the Dark Lord.

episodes.title: Watashi-tachi no mirai on tame ni!
episodes.plot: While Roan tells Yufa about his wrong and say sorry to Yufa, Iruga and Keough dies together. Yufa manages to snapped out and return to normal only to see Roan going to dies. She manages to revived him by a kiss and both battle out the Dark Lord with the help of the Takius's soul (in the wand), Judia and Maya. They manage to defeat the Dark Lord and manage to escaped seeing Glass Heim collapse. In the end, Roan and Yufa were engaged and prays for both Iruga and Keogh's graveyard and gets a new party members, a swordsman and an acolyte with Judia (and her baby) and Maya.
